description:
With "assign"  you can create new variables, or replace an existing one. The way to use it is: <#assign name1=value1>, where name is the name of the variable and value the value to store.
 For example, to store a String, we can use <#assign name1="value1">. To print the value of the variable we can use [=name1]. In this case, create a variable with the value "Hello world!" and print it.
